column2: "Adam n'ebusuasantsen nwoma nye yi. Da a Nyankopɔn bɔɔ nyimpa no
column3: Nyankopɔn ne saso do na ɔyɛɛ no;"

column2: "ɔbanyin nye ɔbaa na ɔbɔɔ hɔn; na ohyiraa hɔn
"Na Adam dzii mfe ɔha eduasa no ɔwoo ne saso babanyin
"na Adam woo Set no n'ekyir ne nda yɛɛ mfe ahaawɔtwe: na ɔwoo mbabanyin nye mbabaa."
"Na nda a Adam dzii nyinara ɔyɛ mfe ahaakron eduasa."
"Set dzii mfe ɔha nye enum no
"Na ɔwoo Enos no n'ekyir odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe nye esuon
"na Set ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaakron nye duebien."
"Na Enos dzii mfe eduokron no
"na Enos woo Kenan no n'ekyir odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe duenum
"na Enos ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaakron nye enum."
"Na Kenan dzii mfe eduosuon
"na Kenan woo Mahalalel no n'ekyir no odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe eduanan
"na Kenan ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaakron nye du: na owui."
"Na Mahalalel dzii mfe eduosia enum
"na Mahalalel woo Jared no n'ekyir odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe eduasa
"Mahalalel ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaawɔtwe eduokron enum."
"Na Jared dzii mfe ɔha eduosia ebien
"na Jared woo Enok no n'ekyir odzii mfe ahaawɔtwe
column3: na ɔsanee woo mbabanyin nye mbabaa:"

column2: "na Jared ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaakron eduosia ebien na owui."
"Enok dzii mfe eduosia enum no
"na Enok woo Metusela no n'ekyir ɔnye Nyankopɔn nantseew mfe ahaasa
column3: na ɔwoo mbabanyin nye mbabaa binom so."

column2: "Enok ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaasa eduosia enum:"
"na Enok nye Nyankopɔn nantsewee: na woennhu no bio
"Metusela dzii mfe ɔha eduowɔtwe esuon no
"na Metusela woo Lamek no ekyir no
column4: na no mu na ɔsanee woo mbabanyin nye mbabaa."

column2: "Metusela ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaakron eduosia akron: na owui."
"Na Lamek dzii mfe ɔha eduowɔtwe ebien
"na ɔtoo no dzin Noa
column4: Oyiara na ɔbɛkyekye hɛn werɛ wɔ hɛn edwuma nye hɛn nsaano berɛ mu
column5: osian asaase a EWURADZE apaa no no ntsi."

column2: "Na Lamek woo Noa no ekyir odzii mfe ahaenum eduokron enum
column3: ɔno mu na ɔwoo mbabanyin nye mbabaa binom so:"

column2: "na Lamek ne nda nyinara yɛɛ mfe ahaesuon eduosuon esuon."
"Na Noa dzii mfe ahaenum no
